        @RequestMapping(value="/cookbook/addRecipe",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String addRecipe(@RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientQuality")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientQuality,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAge")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAge,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAmount")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAmount,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientUnit")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientUnit,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientQuality1")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientQuality1,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAge1")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAge1,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAmount1")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAmount1,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientUnit1")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientUnit1,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientQuality2")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientQuality2,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAge2")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAge2,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAmount2")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAmount2,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientUnit2")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientUnit2,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientWater")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientWater,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientAmount3")
                                                                                                              int ingredientAmount3,
                                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="ingredientUnit3")
                                                                                                              java.lang.String ingredientUnit3,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        add new recipe
        Parameters:
        name - name of recipe
        ingredientQuality - quality of first ingredient
        ingredientAge - age of first ingredient
        ingredientAmount - amount of first ingredient
        ingredientUnit - unit of first ingredient
        ingredientQuality1 - quality of second ingredient
        ingredientAge1 - age of second ingredient
        ingredientAmount1 - amount of second ingredient
        ingredientUnit1 - unit of second ingredient
        ingredientQuality2 - quality of third ingredient
        ingredientAge2 - age of third ingredient
        ingredientAmount2 - amount of third ingredient
        ingredientUnit2 - unit of third ingredient
        ingredientWater - last ingredient (water)
        ingredientAge3 - default value
        ingredientAmount3 - amount of water
        ingredientUnit3 - unit of water
        Returns:
        return the modeling template

      • checkEmptyBottles

        public int checkEmptyBottles(int missedBottles,
                             double maxDestillate,
                             double waterAmount,
                             double selectedBottleAmount,
                             java.util.Optional<org.salespointframework.useraccount.UserAccount> userAccount)
        check, if there are enough empty bottles
        Parameters:
        missedBottles - value of a lack of empty bottles
        maxDestillate - amount of distillate that i have to produce
        waterAmount - amount of ingredient "water"
        selectedBottleAmount - amount of selected bottle type
        userAccount - return the logged user account (salespoint)
        Returns:
        return count of missed empty bottles
